title: Thoughts Around Software Versions
snippet: What do you care about when it comes to versions? I can think of a few from examples of software versioning I’ve seen in the products and tools I use. title: Your Data is Wrong
snippet: I’ve come to the conclusion that when you’re building a software product, your data model will be wrong. Not that it is wrong right now (it might be), but that it will be wrong eventually.For one, your data model and structure is probably wrong right now: most teams work with constraints and are ...

title: Stock Options and Me
snippet: I’m an employee of a (now) public company and I have stock options (like many other people). title: Setting Up This Blog
snippet: Blogging is an interesting phenomenon.
